mission.description: User identified that duplicate work checking system failed and GitHub error emails need standards integration
userInsights: Duplicate work checking system isn't working either
GitHub errors should be part of the standards

duplicateWorkChecking.failure: System didn't prevent AI from building redundant wins/losses tracker

githubErrorMonitoring.failure: Error emails reaching user instead of being handled by standards
githubErrorMonitoring.evidence: User receiving GitHub run error notifications
githubErrorMonitoring.impact: Manual intervention required for automated system failures

prioritizationSystem.gap: No systematic approach to prioritizing fixes vs new features
prioritizationSystem.need: User wants to work on prioritization system

systemicIssues.preventionSystemsFailure: Systems designed to prevent problems are themselves problematic
systemicIssues.monitoringGaps: GitHub automation errors not properly integrated into standards
systemicIssues.workflowInconsistency: Some systems working (standards compliance) others failing (duplicate prevention)

immediateActions: Update handoff to document these gaps
Set context for prioritization system work
Note GitHub error email standards gap
